name: VNRequestProgressProviding
desc: A protocol for providing progress information on long-running tasks in Vision.

items.name: var progressHandler: VNRequestProgressHandler
items.desc: A block of code executed periodically during a Vision request to report progress on long-running tasks.

items.name: var indeterminate: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean set to true when a request can't determine its progress in fractions completed.
